sentences: Michael Richard Lewis (born 17 August 1977) is a Welsh musician.
Lewis studied civil engineering for a year before turning to music.
After the split of Lostprophets in 2013, Lewis became the manager to a few smaller bands.
On 1 May 2014 it was announced that the former members of Lostprophets (including Lewis) have formed a new band and are writing new music.
On 1 July 2014, the new band No Devotion released their first single, "Stay" and have since released their debut album, Permanence.
No Devotion's second album is due to be released sometime in the future, although the only members of the band confirmed to be on the album were Geoff Rickly, Lee Gaze and Stuart Richardson.
In September 2006, Lewis married his girlfriend, Amber (née Payne).
They have a daughter, Gwyneth, and now reside in Malibu, a few streets away from bandmate Jamie Oliver.
He surfs Santa Monica beach almost every day when he is at home.
Ushering in a New Age of Quarrel – a UKHC Tribute to the Cro-Mags (1999)
